ui.panel.config.introduction: Hier is dit moontlik om u komponente en ioBroker op te stel. Tans kan alles in verband met die gebruikerskoppelvlak nog nie hier opgestel word nie, maar ons werk daaraan.

ui.panel.config.areas.caption: Areas
ui.panel.config.areas.description: Oorsig van alle gebiede in u huis.

Om toestelle in 'n gebied te plaas, gebruik die skakel hieronder om na die integrasies bladsy toe te gaan en klik dan op 'n opgestelde integrasie om na die toestelkaarte toe te gaan.

ui.panel.config.tag.detail.usage: A tag can trigger an automation when scanned, you can use NFC tags, QR codes or any other kind of tag. Use our {companion_link} to write this tag to a programmable NFC tag or create a QR code below.

ui.panel.config.core.description: Bevestig u opstellingslêer en beheer die bediener
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: As u opstellings verander, kan dit 'n vermoeiende proses wees. Ons weet. Hierdie afdeling sal probeer om u lewe 'n bietjie makliker te maak.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Redakteur is gedeaktiveer omdat konfigurasie gestoor is in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.analyt: Share analytics from your instance. This data will be publicly available at {link}
You need to enable base analytics for this option to be available
This includes the instance ID, the version and the installation type
Share crash reports and diagnostic information
This includes the names of your integrations
This includes the names and capabilities of your integrations and add-ons
This includes a count of elements in your installation, for a full list look at the documentation
Learn more about how your data will be processed.

ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.detai: Dit kan gevaarlik wees om hulpbronne by te voeg, maak seker dat u die bron van die bron ken en vertrou. Swak hulpbronne kan u stelsel ernstig benadeel.

ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Validate your configuration if you recently made some changes to your configuration and want to make sure that it is all valid
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Some parts of ioBroker can reload without requiring a restart. Hitting reload will unload their current YAML configuration and load the new one.

ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Verfyn per-entiteit eienskappe. Bygevoegde / gewysigde aanpassings sal onmiddellik in werking tree. Verwyderde aanpassings sal in werking tree wanneer die entiteit opgedateer word.
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.includ: Dit lyk asof u konfigurasie.yaml nie behoorlik is nie
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.not_ap: Wysigings wat hier aangebring is, word daarin geskryf, maar sal nie toegepas word na die herlaai van die konfigurasie nie, tensy die insluit in plek is.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_cus: Die volgende kenmerke is reeds opgestel in customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_out: The following attributes are customized from outside of customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.different_incl: Moontlik via 'n domein, 'n glob of 'n ander insluit.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_set: Die volgende eienskappe van die entiteit is programmaties gestel
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_ove: Jy kan hulle oorheers as jy wil.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_not: Die volgende eienskappe is nie gestel nie. Stel dit in as u wil.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Outomatisering
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Die outomatiseringsredakteur stel u in staat om outomatisasies te skep en te wysig. Volg die onderstaande skakel om die instruksies te lees om seker te maak dat u ioBroker korrek opgestel het.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.learn_: Kom meer te wete oor outomatisasies
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Ons kon nie redigeerbare outomatisasies vind nie
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Slegs automasies omskryf in outomatisering. yaml is redigeerbaar.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are debuggable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.delete: Is u seker dat u hierdie outomatisering wil uitvee?
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.ho: How do you want to create your new automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.th: Describe the automation you want to create
And we will try to create it for you. For example: Turn the lights off when I leave.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Gebruik outomatisasies om jou huis lewend te maak
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Slegs outomatisasies in automations.yaml kan verander word.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: U het ongestoorde veranderinge. Is u seker u wil die blad verlaat?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.bluepr: This blueprint doesn't have any inputs.
The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Snellers is wat die prosessering van 'n outomatiseringsreël afskop. Dit is moontlik om verskeie snellers vir dieselfde reël te spesifiseer. Sodra 'n sneller begin, sal ioBroker die voorwaardes, indien enige, bevestig en die aksie roep.
Kom meer te wete oor snellers
Is u seker u wil dit skrap?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Voorwaardes is 'n opsionele deel van 'n outomatiseringsreël en kan gebruik word om te verhoed dat 'n aksie plaasvind wanneer dit geaktiveer word. Voorwaardes lyk baie soos snellers maar is baie anders. 'n Sneller sal kyk na gebeure wat in die stelsel gebeur terwyl 'n voorwaarde net kyk hoe die stelsel lyk. Byvoorbeeld: 'n Sneller kan sien dat 'n skakelaar aangeskakel word. 'n Voorwaarde kan net sien of 'n skakelaar tans aan of af is.
Kom meer te wete oor voorwaardes
Is u seker u wil dit skrap?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: Die aksies is wat ioBroker sal doen wanneer die outomatisering geaktiveer word.
Kom meer te wete oor aksies
Is u seker u wil dit skrap?
ui.panel.config.automation.thingtalk.tas: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a ioBroker automation.
Note: Only English is supported for now.
Enter a command or tap skip.
We couldn't create an automation for that (yet?).
ui.panel.config.automation.thingtalk.lin: Great! Now we need to link some devices
One or more devices have more than one matching entity, please pick the one you want to use.

ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.id_already: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.

ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Beheer terwyl weg van die huis af is, integreer met Alexa en Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
ioBroker Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with ioBroker Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of ioBroker Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of ioBroker away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of ioBroker Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for ioBroker Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your ioBroker instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text to Speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: ioBroker Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the ioBroker skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.syn: Kon nie u entiteite met Google sinkroniseer nie, vra Google 'Hallo Google, sinkroniseer my toestelle' om u entiteite te sinkroniseer.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to ioBroker from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.title: Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entiteit Register
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: ioBroker hou 'n register van al die vorige entiteite wat uniek geïdentifiseer kan word. Elk van hierdie entiteite sal 'n entiteit-ID hê wat vir hierdie entiteit gereserveer sal word.

Gebruik die entiteitsregister om die naam te oorskryf, die entiteit ID te verander, of die inskrywing van ioBroker te verwyder. Let wel, die verwydering van die entiteit registerinskrywing sal nie die entiteit verwyder nie. Om dit te doen, volg die skakel hieronder en verwyder dit uit die integrasies bladsy.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: Dit sal dit weer beskikbaar in die huis assistent maak as hulle nou gedeaktiveer is.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Ge deaktiveerde entiteite sal nie by die Huisassistent gevoeg word nie.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: Entiteite kan slegs verwyder word as die integrasie nie meer die entiteite bied nie.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart ioBroker before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?

ui.panel.config.zone.description: Bestuur die sones waarin jy mense wil naspoor.
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Met sones kan u sekere streke op aarde spesifiseer. As 'n persoon binne 'n sone is, neem die toestand die sonenaam aan. Sones kan ook as 'n sneller of toestand gebruik word in outomatiseringsinstellings.

ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.wa: Setting up support for wake-up queues and messages
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.ma: Obtaining manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.no: Obtaining supported command classes from the node
Obtaining Z-Wave+ information from the node
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.ma: Obtaining additional manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.ve: Obtaining information about firmware and command class versions
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.in: Obtaining details about what instances or channels a device supports
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.st: Obtaining static values from the device
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.ca: Loading information from the OpenZWave cache file. Battery nodes will stay at this stage until the node wakes up.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.ne: Obtaining a list of the node's neighbors
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.se: Obtaining infrequently changing values from the node
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.dy: Obtaining frequently changing values from the node
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_query_stages.co: Obtaining configuration values from the node
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.title: Refresh Node Information
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.descrip: This will tell OpenZWave to re-interview a node and update the node's command classes, capabilities, and values.
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.battery: If the node is battery powered, be sure to wake it before proceeding
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.wakeup_: Wake-up instructions are sourced from the OpenZWave community device database.
ui.panel.config.ozw.network_status.detai: All nodes have been queried. Some nodes were found dead
All awake nodes have been queried
Failed to connect to Z-Wave controller
ui.panel.config.ozw.select_instance.head: Select an OpenZWave Instance
ui.panel.config.ozw.select_instance.intr: You have more than one OpenZWave instance running. Which instance would you like to manage?
ui.panel.config.ozw.select_instance.none: We couldn't find an OpenZWave instance. If you believe this is incorrect, check your OpenZWave and MQTT setups and ensure that ioBroker can communicate with your MQTT broker.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.introduc: Manage the different configuration parameters for a Z-Wave node.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.help_sou: Config parameter descriptions and help text are provided by the OpenZWave project.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.wakeup_h: Battery powered nodes must be awake to change their configuration. If the node is not awake, OpenZWave will attempt to update the node's configuration the next time it wakes up, which could be multiple hours (or days) later. Follow these steps to wake up your device:
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Devices will show up here once discovered.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while discovering is running.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.introductio: Clusters is die boustene vir Zigbee-funksionaliteit. Dit skei funksionaliteit in logiese eenhede. Daar is kliënt- en bedienertipes wat bestaan uit eienskappe en opdragte.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_commands.hel: Select a command to interact with.
The device is ready to use
ui.panel.config.zha.network.caption: Network
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.caption: Groepe
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.group_details: Hier is al die besonderhede vir die geselekteerde Zigbee groep.
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.create_group_: Voer die nodige besonderhede in om 'n nuwe zigbeegroep te skep
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.group_: Kies 'n groep om 'n bindopdrag uit te reik.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.cluste: Kies groepe om aan die geselekteerde groep te bind.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.bind_b: Bind die geselekteerde groep by die geselekteerde toestelgroeperings.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.unbind: Ontbind die geselekteerde groep van die geselekteerde toestelgroeperings.
ui.panel.config.zwave.migration.ozw.head: Migrate to OpenZWave
ui.panel.config.zwave.migration.ozw.intr: This wizard will help you migrate from the legacy Z-Wave integration to the OpenZWave integration that is currently in beta.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Begin opdragte wat die Z-Wave-netwerk beïnvloed. U sal nie terugvoer kry of meeste opdragte slaag nie, maar u kan die OZW-logboek nagaan om dit uit te vind.
ui.panel.config.zwave.node_management.in: Run Z-Wave commands that affect a single node. Pick a node to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zwave.node_management.no: Select node to view per-node options
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: Afhangend van die grootte van u netwerk, kan dit 'n rukkie duur.
Aktiewe Knooppunte is nagevra. Slapende Knooppunte sal nagevra word sodra hulle ontwaak.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave nodes
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.dump_: Download a dump of your network to help diagnose issues
Some of your nodes are dead
Some of your nodes didn't respond and are assumed dead. These will not be fully exported.
Not all nodes are ready yet
If you create an export while not all nodes are ready, you could miss needed data. Give your network some time to query all nodes. Do you want to continue with the dump?
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.int: Manage and adjust device (node) specific configuration parameters for the selected device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.att: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.bat: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.introd: This wizard will guide you through adding a node to your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.secure: Secure devices require additional bandwidth; too many secure devices can slow down your Z-Wave network. We recommend only using secure inclusion for devices that require it, like locks or garage door openers.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.contro: Your Z-Wave controller is now in inclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.follow: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.inclus: The node could not be added. Please check the logs for more information.
The node has been added. It may take a few minutes for all entities to show up as we finish setting up the node in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a node from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The node could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Node {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
